Tunable.name: CAS_LOCKED_ICON
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed if this row is locked in cas.

Tunable.name: CAS_UNLOCKED_ICON
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed if this row is unlocked in cas.

Tunable.name: CRAFTING_RESUME_INTERACTION
Tunable.description: A Tunable Reference to the CraftingResumeInteraction for interaction save/load to reference in order to resume crafting interactions.

Tunable.name: GRAB_WHILE_STANDING_PENALTY
Tunable.description: An additional penalty to apply to the constraint of grabbing a serving of food while standing so Sims will prefer to sit before grabbing the food if possible.
